title: Charging Your Way: Stellantis Launches Free2move Charge to Make it 'Easy to Always Be Charged' - Stellantis
summary: Stellantis has launched Free2move Charge, a 360-degree ecosystem providing seamless EV charging and energy management to address all customer needs, launching in North America and expanding to Europe. The ecosystem includes hardware, software, and services under the new Stellantis Charging & Energy Business Unit, supporting electrification and sustainability goals.
green_innovation: TRUE. This initiative focuses on enhancing sustainability through electric vehicle charging solutions, addressing environmental impacts and promoting a greener future.
business_innovation: TRUE. The launch of Free2move Charge represents a new product and business process, differing significantly from the company's previous offerings and introducing innovative solutions in the EV charging and energy management sector.
green_product: TRUE. Free2move Charge qualifies as a green product as it is designed to significantly reduce the environmental impact throughout its life cycle by providing efficient and sustainable charging solutions for electric vehicles.
green_process: TRUE. Free2move Charge encompasses green processes by promoting sustainability through methods and techniques that minimize environmental impacts, such as reducing waste, conserving resources, and increasing energy efficiency.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 336111 - Automobile Manufacturing, 221122 - Electric Power Distribution, 541330 - Engineering Services, 238210 - Electrical Contractors and Other Wiring Installation Contractors
greenwashing: FALSE. The article does not exhibit greenwashing as it focuses on genuine efforts to provide sustainable charging solutions and energy management, aligned with environmental and electrification goals without making false or misleading statements.
